snippet.title: The Last Door Season 2 - Full Playthrough / Longplay / Walkthrough (no commentary)
snippet.description:
Longplay / full playthrough of The Last Door Season 2 Collector's Edition, a classic point and click adventure with a pixel art retro look and feel and a setting inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and Edgar Allan Poe. Recorded by Dahlia, published 1 September 2018.

Dahlia's notes: This is a recording of my second playthrough of The Last Door 2 Collector's Edition. In my first playthrough I decided to save Wakefield - you can see/read this story attached right after the credits of the full game - the second playthrough when I went through the courtain and  saved Devitt. Another appendix is the episode "The mask with noch Eyes". The longplay unfortunately only contains the secrets I discorvered till now. Meanwhile I read a guide and figured out that there are at least five secrets missing, so if you follow this vid you will be able to get all achievements except "Playwright: discover all secrets".

The Last Door Season 2 playthrough content:
0:00:00 Episode 1 The Playwright 
0:53:32 Episode 2 My Dearest Visitor
2:01:30 Episode 3 The Reunion
2:56:56 Episode 4 Beyond the Curtain
3:36:00 Save Devitt's Life (ending)
3:43:01 Save Wakefield's Life (ending)
3:46:25 The Mask With No Eyes

The Last Door Season 2 release dates:
- Windows PC: 31 October 2014 (episode 1)
- Mac OS: 31 October 2014 (episode 1)
- Linux: 31 October 2014 (episode 1)
- iOS: 27 October 27 2016 (Collector's Edition)
- Android: 27 October 2016 (Collector's Edition)

Get The Last Door Collector's Edition at Humble Bundle:
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/the-last-door-season-2-collectors-edition?partner=Ludophiles

The Last Door Season 1 longplay:
- https://youtu.be/UK-WVobPvOk

The Last Door 2 is longplay No. 242 of the Ludophiles longplays project:
- https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFXG3BI19O5rpA9sB1_-K_x5s207hoahb
- http://www.ludophiles.com/threads/ludophiles-longplays-project.180/

#ludophiles #ludophilia #gaming #indiegame #longplay #playthrough #walkthrough #PointAndClick #adventure #horror
